ModMetaData.name: Toolkit Core 2.0e
ModMetaData.author: Captolamia
ModMetaData.description:
🌟 **Twitch Toolkit Core 2.0e - Foundation for Twitch Integration** 🌟
The essential base mod for complete Twitch integration in RimWorld 1.6. This experimental update provides the core framework that powers the entire Twitch Toolkit ecosystem.
**⚠️ COMPLETE TWITCH EXPERIENCE REQUIRES:** • Twitch Toolkit 2.0e (main features) • ToolkitUtils 2.0e (enhanced commands)
**Features:** • Core Twitch integration framework • Foundation for viewer interaction systems • Compatibility with RimWorld 1.6 + All DLCs
**Report Issues:** https://github.com/ekudram/ToolkitCore-Forked/issues **Documentation:** https://github.com/ekudram/ToolkitCore-Forked/wiki
